import React from 'react' import '../css/pure-css-progress-bars-master/assets/css/cssprogress.css' const ChampionStatBars = (props) => { return(

ATTACK: {props.info.attack}

{$}

DEFENSE: {props.info.defense}

) } export default ChampionStatBars
